Class PlayerCharacter

java.lang.Object
com.codeinspace.interactivetabletop.lib.abstracts.CharacterBase
com.codeinspace.interactivetabletop.lib.models.PlayerCharacter
public class PlayerCharacter extends CharacterBase
Represents a character played by a player.
